700935f-a.title: Bronx: Tremont Avenue (East - Castle Hill Avenue
700935f-a.text:
2201 and 2217 Eaat Tregont Ave., at, and adjoining the N.E. corner
of Castle Hill Ave. The 27c -story frame house, seen across the roof of
the 1-story structure faces on the south side of Haviland Ave., and bears
No. 2210 thereon.
July 1, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
700935f-a.folder: Tremont Avenue (East & Castle Hill Avenue, Bronx, NY

700936f-a.title: Bronx: Tremont Avenue (East - Castle Hill Avenue
700936f-a.text:
East Tremont Ave., at the S.W. corner of Castle Hill Ave., showing
St. Raymond's Church (R.C.).
August 25, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
700936f-a.folder: Tremont Avenue (East & Castle Hill Avenue, Bronx, NY

700934f.title: Bronx: Tremont Avenue (East - Castle Hill Avenue
700934f.text:
S.E. corner ofE. Iremont Ave. E Castle Hill Ave., 6ronx.
Sept 4, 1939
P.L. Sperr, photographer
